A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: lazy solution to dealing with needing a new lead. About as innovative as having the main character wake to find it was all a dream. Luke's character deserved better. They'll make more movies and call them Star Wars but they aren't really. I just don't care about the new characters. Kylo ren is a joke as a big bad and Rey is meh and doesn't have enough cache as a character to carry the new movies.
